name: git-board-flow
description: Automates branch management, GitHub project linking, and issue/PR tracking with Git-Flow methodology.

scripts.build-macos-x64: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o build/github_action/macos/x64 && ncc build src/cli.ts -o build/cli/macos/x64
scripts.build-macos-arm64: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o build/github_action/macos/arm64 && ncc build src/cli.ts -o build/cli/macos/arm64
scripts.build-linux-x64: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o build/github_action/linux/x64 && ncc build src/cli.ts -o build/cli/linux/x64
scripts.build-linux-arm64: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o build/github_action/linux/arm64 && ncc build src/cli.ts -o build/cli/linux/arm64
scripts.build-common: ncc build runner/github_action.ts -o build/github_action && ncc build runner/cli.ts -o build/cli && chmod +x build/cli/index.js

author: Landa Messenger
